name: qianxin-threat-intel
label: QiAnxin Threat Intelligence
description: QiAnxin Threat Intelligence Center provides automate processing and the manual operation of top security research teams to provide users with accurate threat intelligence based on multi-dimensional and global data collection capabilities. QiAnxin Threat Intelligence connector performs actions like IP reputation, file reputation etc.

fields.name: server_url
fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify (or review) the URL of the QiAnxin Threat Intelligence server to which you will connect and retrieve data. For example, https://ti.qianxin.com.

fields.name: api_key
fields.title: API Key
fields.description: Specify the API Token that is configured for your account for using the QiAnxin Threat Intelligence APIs.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Get IP Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves a report from QiAnxin Threat Intelligence Center containing the IP reputation and security-related information based on the IP address you have specified.

parameters.name: reputation_of
parameters.title: Reputation of
parameters.tooltip: Get reputation of single IP or list of IPs
parameters.description:
Select whether you want to retrieve the IP reputation of a single IP address or a list of IP addresses from QiAnxin. 

If you choose 'Single' then in the IP Address field specify a single IP address for which you want to retrieve a QiAnxin report. 

If you choose 'Batch', then in the IP Addresses field specify IP addresses in the list or CSV format for which you want to retrieve a QiAnxin report. 
Note: At one time, you can specify a maximum of 50 IP addresses.

Single.name: ip
Single.title: IP Address
Single.description: Provide single IP address for which you want to retrieve a QiAnxin report.

Batch.name: ips
Batch.title: IP Addresses
Batch.tooltip: CSV or list of IP address. At one time, you can specify a maximum of 50 IP addresses.
Batch.description: Provide CSV or list of IP address for which you want to retrieve a QiAnxin report. Note: At one time, you can specify a maximum of 50 IP addresses.

operations.title: Get File Reputation
operations.description: Retrieves accurate and detailed malicious file detection reports from QiAnxin Threat Intelligence Center based on the MD5/SHA1 filehash values you have specified.

parameters.name: advance
parameters.title: Advanced File Reputation
parameters.tooltip: The Advanced file reputation interface provides more rich fields than the normal file reputation interface of QiAnxin
parameters.description: Select this option if you want to use the 'Advanced file reputation interface' to retrieve the reputation for the filehashes you have specified from QiAnxin. The Advanced file reputation interface provides more rich fields than the normal file reputation interface of QiAnxin.

parameters.name: reputation_of
parameters.title: Reputation of
parameters.tooltip: Select whether you want to retrieve the file reputation of a single MD1/SHA1 filehash or a list of MD1/SHA1 filehashes from QiAnxin
parameters.description:
Select whether you want to retrieve the file reputation of a single MD1/SHA1 filehash or a list of MD1/SHA1 filehashes from QiAnxin. If you choose 'Single' then in the MD5/SHA1 Hash field specify a single MD5/SHA1 filehash for which you want to retrieve a QiAnxin report. 

If you choose 'Batch', then in the MD5/SHA1 field specify MD5/SHA1 filehashes in the list or CSV format for which you want to retrieve a QiAnxin report. 
Note: At one time, you can specify a maximum of 50 MD5/SHA1 filehashes.

Single.name: hash
Single.title: MD5/SHA1 Hash
Single.description: Provide single MD5/SHA1 for which you want to retrieve a QiAnxin report.

Batch.name: hashes
Batch.title: MD5/SHA1
Batch.tooltip: CSV of MD5/SHA1. Maximum 50 MD5/SHA1 allowed. At one time, you can specify a maximum of 50 MD5/SHA1 filehashes.
Batch.description: Provide CSV of MD5/SHA1 for which you want to retrieve a QiAnxin report. Note. One time maximum 50 MD5/SHA1 allowed.

operations.title: Get Loss Detection Data
operations.description: Retrieves alarms and different log data from QiAnxin Threat Intelligence Center based on the IP address, domain name, or URL, and other input parameters you have specified.

parameters.name: request_of
parameters.title: Request of
parameters.tooltip: Request for single or batch of IP/domain or URL
parameters.description:
Select whether you want to retrieve alarm information of a single IP address, domain, or URL, or a list of IP addresses, domains, or URLs. 

If you choose 'Single' then in the Value field specify a single IP address, domain name, or URL for which you want to retrieve data from QiAnxin. 

If you choose 'Batch', then in the Values field specify IP addresses, domain names, or URLs, in the list or CSV format for which you want to retrieve data from QiAnxin. 
Note: At one time, you can specify a maximum of 50 IP addresses, domain names, or URLs.

Single.name: param_value
Single.title: Value
Single.tooltip: Single value of IP, domain name, or URL
Single.description: Provide single IP,domain name, or URL which you want to retrieve data from QiAnxin.

Batch.name: params_value
Batch.title: Values
Batch.tooltip: CSV or list of IP, domain name and URL. At one time, you can specify a maximum of 50 IP addresses, domain names, or URLs.
Batch.description: Provide CSV or list of IP, domain name and URL for which you want to retrieve a data from QiAnxin. Note. At one time, you can specify a maximum of 50 IP addresses, domain names, or URLs.

parameters.name: ignore_url
parameters.title: Ignore URL
parameters.tooltip: Whether to ignore IOC middle URL part. Default: true
parameters.description: Whether to ignore IOC middle URL part. True: ignore False: not ignore. Default: true

parameters.name: ignore_port
parameters.title: Ignore Port
parameters.tooltip: Whether to ignore IOC middle port part. Default: true
parameters.description: Whether to ignore IOC middle port part. True: ignore False: not ignore. Default: true

parameters.name: ignore_top
parameters.title: Ignore Top
parameters.tooltip: Whether to ignore global domain name resolution top 1000 of domain name. Default: true
parameters.description: Whether to ignore global domain name resolution top 1000 of domain name. True: ignore False: not ignore. Default: true
